episodesJson.title: Gluck's reform of opera
episodesJson.description: This program focuses on the major changes that composer Christoph Willibald Gluck brought to opera in the 18th century.

subject.name: Gluck, Christoph Willibald, Ritter von, 1714-1787. Operas
Gluck, Christoph Willibald, Ritter von, 1714-1787. Orfeo ed Euridice.
